titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: <*> = monetary amount, maybe "8"? <*> = no idea, part of title ending in "look down" <*> = addendum to date, not all numbers clear s2: <*> = "Maniafes"? <*> = "lumber"?

body.ab:
1939 CHOPARD, Mme. S. 55 rue Lafontaine Fontenay-aux-Roses
3m 1va 65 dep 50
May 31 Prodigal Parents june 12 June 12 Midas Touch. pd <*>. june 16 16 Seven against Reeves june 19 19 Citadel. june 30 30 The <*> look down july 3rd july 3 <*> The Colonel's daughter. july 17 17 Fighting angel July 24 july 24 Straw without Bricks july 29 Subscription to be continued in September as did not take any books in August. started again one month left, to March 3 1940 Feb 3 My American 2v a day Feb 9 9 Farewell to Arms Feb 15 15 To have and to have not Feb 21 21 Ann Vickers March 4 Renewed March 3 - June 3 1940 1 v A 65
April 18 Three <*> April 25 26 Gone with the Wind May 21 May 21 Seasoned <*> May 31 May 31 Delicate Monster June 5 June 5 After many a Summer Renewed June 3- Sept 3 1940 1vA 65
